lyrics:
I hit surrender, was down on the floor
You had me broken but not anymore
I′m gonna run, oh baby, I'm gonna fly

La-la-la-la-la, now this is goodbye

Flee from the monsters that I used to know
They′ll never catch me wherever I go
Out of the darkness, baby, into the light
La-la-la-la-la, now this is goodbye
La-la-la...

I hit surrender, was down on the floor
You had me broken but not anymore
I'm gonna run, oh baby, I'm gonna fly
La-la-la-la-la, now this is goodbye

Flee from the monsters that I used to know
They′ll never catch me wherever I go
Out of the darkness, baby, into the light
La-la-la-la-la, now this is goodbye

(La-la-la-la-la, now this is goodbye)
La-la-la...

I hit surrender, was down on the floor
You had me broken but not anymore
I′m gonna run, oh baby, I'm gonna fly
La-la-la-la-la, now this is goodbye

Flee from the monsters that I used to know
They′ll never catch me wherever I go
Out of the darkness, baby, into the light
La-la-la-la-la, now this is goodbye
(Goodbye, now this is goodbye, goodbye)
imageDescription: A silhouette of a person running towards a bright, radiant light. The person is breaking free from chains that were holding them down. In the background, shadowy figures representing the "monsters" are trying to catch up, but the person is leaving them behind. The image symbolizes liberation, strength, and moving on from past struggles.
